A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Underwhelming. Great fight scenes\, special effects. Lackluster story. Keeps with the previous movies habit of not really doing the original characters justice or giving them a great send off. The new characters are meh\, not to say the actors/actresses are bad (I think they're good)\, the characters they play are just...not interesting? Worst part about this movie is it takes a hero from the original trilogy\, and shits on his memory. Go read the Timothy Zahn books. Way better.
